Body: As far as anyone here knows, are there any natural languages in which the apico-labial trill is a phoneme?
Title: Is the apico-labial trill a phoneme in any language?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I'm a conlanger who needs reliable information about real languages. By profession, I'm a speech/language therapist, so some of my questions may be work-related as well.
